text: SAVAK (, abbreviation for Sâzemân-e Ettelâ'ât va Amniat-e Kešvar, )Summary - U.S. Department of State - State Department was the secret police, domestic security and intelligence service in Iran during the reign of the Pahlavi dynasty. == Directors == ==Related pages== *Second Bureau of Imperial Iranian Army *Prime Ministry Intelligence Office *Ministry of Intelligence (Iran) ==References== ==Other websites== *Ministry of Intelligence and Security VEVAK – Iran Intelligence Agencies at website of Federation of American Scientists Category:Intelligence agencies Category:1957 establishments in Asia Category:1979 disestablishments in Asia Category:20th-century establishments in Iran Category:Organisations based in Iran
title: SAVAK
